Translations.Text: Niyakyy lyudsʹkyy buduchy ne mozhe peredaty z BOHOM krim cherez natkhnennya, abo zzadu bar'yer, abo posylayuchy kur'yeru cherez komu Vin vidkryvaye yakyy Vin wills. Vin yavlyaye soboyu Naybilʹsh Vysoko, Naybilʹsh Mudryy

Otzhe, my nadykhnuly do vas vidkryttya proholoshuyuchi nashi zapovidi. Vy ne maly ideyi pro svyate pysannya, abo vira. Dosi, my zrobyly tse beacon shchob keruvaty whomever my vybyrayemo z chysla nashykh sluzhbovtsiv. Bezsumnivno, vy keruyete u pryamomu shlyakhu
shlyakh BOHA, komu nalezhytʹ vse u nebi ta vse na zemli. Absolyutno, vsi materialy kontrolyuyutʹsya BOHOM
M
Ta vysvitlyuyuche svyate pysannya
My nadaly tse arabsʹki Quran, shcho vy mozhete zrozumity
Tse zberihayetʹsya z namy v oryhinali mayster, pochesnyy ta povnyy wisdom
my tilʹky Musymo proihnoruvaty toy fakt, shcho vy porushyly mezhi
My poslaly bahato proroka do poperednikh heneratsiy
Kozhnyy chas prorok poyikhav yim, vony ridiculed yo
Otzhe, my vynyshchyly lyudey shcho buly navitʹ bilʹshe potuzhni nizh tsey. My takym chynom vstanovlyuyemo pryklady z poperednikh spilʹnot
Yakshcho b vy poprosyly yikh, "Khto utvoryv nebo ta zemlyu," vony by skazaly, Mohutniy, Omniscient utvoryv yikh
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto zrobyv habitable zemli dlya vas, ta stvoryuvaly dlya vas dorohy tam, shcho vy mozhete proslidkuvaty za pravom shlyakh
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto posylaye vnyz z neba voda, u tochniy miri, shchob vidnovyty mertvi zemli therewith. Analohichno, vy budete resurrected
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto utvoryv vsi riznovydy, paramy (muzhchyna ta zhinka), ta Vin stvoryuvav dlya vas korabelʹ ta domashna khudoba yikhaty
Tomu shcho vy spyrayetesya na vershynu z nykh, vy budete otsinyty take blahoslovennya z vashoho Lorda, ta kazhete, "Slava musytʹ khto pidkoryv tse dlya nas. My ne mohly prokontrolyuvaly yikh sobi
My ostatochno vertayemo do nashoho Lorda
Vony navitʹ pryznachyly dlya Nʹoho aktsiya z Yoho vlasnoho stvorennya! Bezsumnivno, lyudsʹke isnuvannya ye hlyboko unappreciative
Vin vybrav z chysla Yoho dochok stvorennya dlya Sebe, toy chas, yak blahoslovlyayuchy vas z synamy
Koly odyn z nykh dayetʹsya novynu (dochky) tomu shcho vony zayavyly dlya naybilʹshoyi Dobrozychlyvoyi, yoho oblychchya temnytʹsya z neshchastyam ta hnivom
(Yak kazhutʹ,) "Shcho harnyy pro offspring shcho vykhovuyetʹsya shchob buty krasyvyy, ta ne mozhe dopomoha u viyni
Vony zayavyly shcho anhely, khto sluzhbovtsi naybilʹshoho Dobrozychlyvi, zhinky! Vony zasvidchyly yikhnye stvorennya? Yikhni pretenziyi zapysuyutʹsya, ta vony budutʹ prosytysya
Vony navitʹ skazaly, "Yakshcho naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvyy willed, my by ne obozhnyuvaly yikh." Vony ne mayutʹ bazy dlya takoyi pretenziyi; vony tilʹky prypuskayutʹ
my daly yim knyhu pered tse, ta vony upholding tse
Sprava v tomu, shcho: vony skazaly, "My znayshly nashykh batʹkiv vykonuyuchi pevni vpravy, ta my slidkuyemo u yikhnikh krokakh
Nezminno, koly my poslaly warner do budʹ-yakoyi spilʹnoty, lidery, kotra spilʹnota skazhe, "My znayshly nashykh batʹkiv nastupni pevni vpravy, ta my prodovzhymo u yikhnikh krokakh
